bool IsEquivalent (  int8  i1,
int8  i2
)  [inline]
 

Returns whether two signed or unsigned integers are equivalent.

For integers, this function simply wraps around the operator==.

Parameters:
i1 A first integer.
i2 A second integer.
Returns:
Whether the two integers are equivalent.
